name: test_e2e_with_logs[035_SQLI_BYPASS_006]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_BYPASS_006` |
| **Name** | Pipe character bypass |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | bypass_waf |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `'||UNION||SELECT||version(),NULL,NULL--`
- **Encoded**: `'%7C%7CUNION%7C%7CSELECT%7C%7Cversion()%2CNULL%2CNULL--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~28000ms
- **Timestamp**: 03:14:20.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_BYPASS_006-1767842060446-4i76q pattern_id=SQLI_BYPASS_006 uri=/?q='%7C%7CUNION%7C%7CSELECT%7C%7Cversion()%2CNULL%2CNULL-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
